name: Emirates Airline
goal: Emirates is an airline that operates almost 4,000  passenger and cargo flights per week across 154 destinations in 83 countries and six continents via its hub in Dubai.
euInitiatives:
• EU external aviation policy
• Emissions trading scheme
• Regulation 261/2004
• Revision of Regulation 868/2004
• Aviation Strategy
• Employment rights
• EASA Basic Regulation
• Brexit
• Airport charges (or Directive 2009/12/EC)
